trans-unit.source: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the pool.
trans-unit.target: Specifies whether automatic scaling is enabled for the pool.

trans-unit.source: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if automatic scaling is enabled; otherwise, <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.
trans-unit.target: <languageKeyword>true</languageKeyword> if automatic scaling is enabled; otherwise, <languageKeyword>false</languageKeyword>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about automatic scaling, see <externalLink><linkText>Automatically scale task virtual machines in an Azure Batch pool</linkText><linkUri>https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/documentation/articles/batch-automatic-scaling/</linkUri></externalLink>.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to enable automatic scaling on a pool as it is created.
trans-unit.target: The following example shows how to enable automatic scaling on a pool as it is created.
